label: A2B7C2_mP22_14_e_a3e_e-001
title: Er$_{2}$Si$_{2}$O$_{7}$ Structure
comments:
(Felsche, 1970) refers to this as the ``D-RE$_{2}$Si$_{2}$O$_{7}$ structure, where ``RE'' is a rare-earth element. 
 Some authors use Ho$_{2}$Si$_{2}$O$_{7}$ as the prototype structure, but (Smolin, 1970) only gives lattice parameters for that compound, while giving full structural information for Er$_{2}$Si$_{2}$O$_{7}$, so we use this as the prototype. 
 (Smolin, 1970) give the structure in the $P2_1/b$ setting of space group \#14 with a unique $c$-axis.  We used FINDSYM to transform this to the standard $P2_1/c$ setting with unique axis $b$.
